Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Richmond Place Apartments, you'll be centrally located in Edinburgh, steps from Surgeon's Hall and minutes from Festival Theatre. This apartment is close to Greyfriars Kirk and St. Giles' Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 32 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and microwaves.

Dining
Full breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10:30 AM
